text: Pokrovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Korneyevsky Selsoviet, Meleuzovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 128 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 44 km from Meleuz, 2 km from Korneyevka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Meleuzovsky District
title: Pokrovka, Meleuzovsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
